Class RuleSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • RuleSet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScoreRules, StandardRules, ThreePlayerRules

    public abstract class RuleSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for the different Game rules
    Author:
    Andrew Ngo
